and-policy.name: and-policy
and-policy.description: Representing a logical and, the policy allows a request if and only if all child policies allow the request.

restrict-policy.name: restrict-policy
restrict-policy.description: The cloud platform restricts the tenant from accessing resources of other tenants through the policy.

or-policy.name: or-policy
or-policy.description: Represents a logical or, which allows a request if and only if at least one sub-policy allows the request.

enable-policy.name: enable-policy
enable-policy.display-name: Built-in policy - grants tenants the necessary permissions
enable-policy.description: The cloud platform grants the tenant the necessary rights, such as the self-tenant policy editing permission, to prevent the tenant from mistaking the policy.

custom-all-pass-policy.name: custom-all-pass-policy
custom-all-pass-policy.display-name: Tenant Customization Policy - Allows all operations
